home.title: The Real Impact of AI on Programming Work
home.intro: Thank you for completing the survey and sharing your thoughts on GitHub Copilot. To gain a deeper and more accurate understanding of how GitHub Copilot is shaping the everyday work of developers, weâ€™re now taking the next step. Beyond perceptions, we want to see how real work practices and routines evolve when developers collaborate with AI tools. For this, we kindly invite you to contribute digital trace data from a tool you already use: GitLab. With your consent, this data will help us uncover meaningful patterns and changes that surveys alone cannot capture. We appreciate your support.

prize.title: Win a Prize!
prize.content: As a thank you, you will be entered into a draw for a chance to win a prize!

gitlab.name: Gitlab.com
gitlab.description: Based on the (anonymized) data from Gitlab, we will be able to better understand changes in, for example how pull requests are structured, how things change over time. Given this, we can better isolate Copilot's effects from "natural" effects.

gitlab-onprem.name: Gitlab
gitlab-onprem.description: Based on the (anonymized) data from Gitlab, we will be able to better understand changes in, for example how pull requests are structured, how things change over time. Given this, we can better isolate Copilot's effects from "natural" effects.

jiralocal.name: Jira
jiralocal.description: Using the (anonymized) data from Jira, we can identify external events, such as requirement changes, better and therefore better isolate how things changed due to the introduction of Copilot.

jiracloud.name: Jira (Cloud)
jiracloud.description: Using the (anonymized) data from Jira, we can identify external events, such as requirement changes, better and therefore better isolate how things changed due to the introduction of Copilot.

signup.success: Have your User-ID registered as admin.
